articles.description: The investment in Pi Ventures comes from Binny Bansal, and Mamaearth's Varun Alagh, among others. Pi Venture's second fund's base target is Rs 565 crore.
articles.content: Pi Ventures, which invests in deeptech startups, raised Rs 300 crore ($40 million) from Binny Bansal, Flipkart's former boss, Mamaearth's Varun Alagh, and MakeMyTrip's Deep Kalra, in the first close … [+3285 chars]

articles.title: Tata Steel Q3 PAT seen up 155% YoY to Rs. 9,676 cr: ICICI Direct - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: Net Sales are expected to increase by 41 percent Y-o-Y (down 2 percent Q-o-Q) to Rs. 59,280 crore, according to ICICI Direct.
